title: Bi-Weekly Music Discussion Thread
selftext:
What is r/India listening to? Share and discuss songs, playlists, artists, or anything music-related here!

If you're a musician yourself, please share your work so we can all hear what up-and-coming musicians are doing these days.

Don't just mention stuff, link it! Links that are official and provided by the artists themselves are preferred.

**Music Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Music+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/06d0xwq1x8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=4195dbb767ebd70a3209ea46a4497062e788c176
comments: Bones by Imagine dragons is amazing, it came out a week ago.

I‚Äôve been kind of binging on Bloodywood‚Äôs Aaj https://youtu.be/kgvH6tX4Ej0

And Electric Callboy‚Äôs Pump It https://youtu.be/OnzkhQsmSag

In Rainbows by Radiohead on repeat all day.[https://open.spotify.com/album/5vkqYmiPBYLaalcmjujWxK?si=plcR2XQaQBGrkTfbQpXeuQ](https://open.spotify.com/album/5vkqYmiPBYLaalcmjujWxK?si=plcR2XQaQBGrkTfbQpXeuQ)
so good...love 15 step, weird fishes and nude

I finished DBZ abridged because I wanted something chill to watch, and honestly, it's such a good adaptation, way better than the original anime, which has now made me go and reread the manga and listen to [Cha la Head Cha la](https://youtu.be/X3IDiZ9cVTI) on repeat.

Been listening to chill relaxing songs
 
Slowdive - [Machine Gun](https://open.spotify.com/track/3Md1APzDGyfBBNQ2l7O5nj?si=33660afd1fc84e3b)
 
Mazzy Star - [Winter Harbor](https://open.spotify.com/track/4V79NKNUFkjzHWcPLtdlNM?si=0530d1c8e7724f4d)
 
Opeth - [Hours of Wealth](https://open.spotify.com/track/1fd8YbOoVAU8KK5ONDOqs9?si=be1c293fb02a44ba)
 
Depeche Mode - [Enjoy the Silence](https://open.spotify.com/track/6WK9dVrRABMkUXFLNlgWFh?si=6586eb47725844b3)
[https://youtu.be/De2SvN8LFcE](https://youtu.be/De2SvN8LFcE)
Entire album is a water tight experience full of emotions and warmth.

My three recos for the thread:  

- Lost myself by Eric krasno. Funky beat.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9mHLc7Y_mao  

- Wild Child by The Black Keys. Catchy rock song.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KKSmHOUaqaQ&t=89s  

- The Curse of the Blackened Eye by Orville Peck. Soulful country music.  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0JyHptBtKW8
thanks for sharing this playlist!
Melodic death metal. Any day https://open.spotify.com/playlist/12lIqVJyEJWBjeHZrYV129?si=NFToEY8fQJGV4Ci664-INw&utm_source=copy-link
quotebot

It is a necessity to know what it is like to train, and train damn hard. ‚ÄúIf you don‚Äôt have those experiences and those memories you can‚Äôt guide somebody else through that.‚Äù
Training Should be Thought of as the Application and Manipulation of Stressors"

I am currently addicted to the new album Impera by the band Ghost! For those who are not aware of them, they are a modern Hard Rock band from Sweden with a very interesting and fresh take on the genre!

 [Impera - Ghost](https://open.spotify.com/album/3fn4HfVz5dhmE0PG24rh6h?si=4D_PnVdBTsG3rbvt50F0jA)
Really like The Black Keys!
Good Opeth song choice
That Bloodywood album is amazing! Heard the whole album multiple times and its one of my favourite releases of the year (so far)
Can anyone share playlist for running?
Thank you man, this is fueling my day at work today.
Was going through their hits on Spotify today, didn't realise they'd made so many awesome songs over the years!
Also check out Dirty Honey, The Struts, Greta Van Fleet, Kaleo and Ghost. They are some really good modern rock bands!
Will do! Greta Van fleet I'm familiar with, their lead singer has one hell of a voice :)
Enjoy! üòÅ
all opeth is good opeth
Indeed
amazing band

The place where he inserted the blade- Black Country; New Road

[https://open.spotify.com/track/3k2kIiJqUiIP49iUcOLpWT?si=770c43703ed4464c](https://open.spotify.com/track/3k2kIiJqUiIP49iUcOLpWT?si=770c43703ed4464c)

Bloodhail- Have a Nice lIfe

[https://open.spotify.com/track/5qZ4c1EBVWpmz1GBaks8Uq?si=5e7c59baa2944ad4](https://open.spotify.com/track/5qZ4c1EBVWpmz1GBaks8Uq?si=5e7c59baa2944ad4)

Nude- Radiohead

[https://open.spotify.com/track/35YyxFpE0ZTOoqFx5bADW8?si=708cbf52997344a2](https://open.spotify.com/track/35YyxFpE0ZTOoqFx5bADW8?si=708cbf52997344a2)

2+2=5 by Radiohead

[https://open.spotify.com/track/4xkcGfpM9RwB4IiQ7yx2dB?si=d73bfb58af5c4568](https://open.spotify.com/track/4xkcGfpM9RwB4IiQ7yx2dB?si=d73bfb58af5c4568)
comfort album
bodysnatchers is my fav
Very true
My fav slowdive song man I love souvlaki
Check out black midi. You'll probably like them
What genre?
i love black midi. cavalcade was my aoty for 2021
Just recently discovered souvlaki and this is my favourite off the album
Anything that is captivating
